backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state, serving as a placeholder backend.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features: Welcome screen navigation (REQ-16) and theme/color palette functionality (REQ-18).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including components, screens, state management, hooks, and mock data modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme CSS variables for the entire application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the TradeBuddy application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing screen navigation state, rendering Welcome screen initially, and conditionally displaying BottomNav for non-welcome screens.
frontend/src/components/charts/MockPrice: Canvas-based price chart component rendering line charts with gradient fills, grid lines, and price labels without external charting dependencies.
frontend/src/components/nav/BottomNav.ts: Bottom navigation bar with seven touch-friendly icon buttons showing active state and labels for main app screens.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing ICP actor creation with authentication support, returning actor instance based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/usePriceSimulation.ts: Custom hook generating simulated real-time price data with playback controls (start/pause/reset) and adjustable speed for practice mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Intentionally empty placeholder file since the prototype uses local mock data and Zustand stores instead of backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file with Tailwind directives, CSS custom properties for light/dark theme color tokens (using OKLCH color space), and keyframe animations for title entrance and welcome screen effects.
frontend/src/lib/mockData/aiSignals.ts: Defines AISignal interface and exports mock AI trading signals with bullish/bearish/neutral types, confidence scores, and descriptions for stocks like AAPL, TSLA, MSFT, and GOOGL.
frontend/src/lib/mockData/learning.ts: Exports mock data for educational content including lessons (with difficulty levels and categories), video tutorials with thumbnails, and trading tips for beginners.
frontend/src/lib/mockData/markets.ts: Provides mock market data including market overview indices (S&P 500, Nasdaq, etc.), trending stocks, and watchlist items with prices and percentage changes.
frontend/src/lib/mockData/trading.ts: Defines stock options data and a utility function to generate mock time-series price data with volume for charting purposes.
frontend/src/lib/navigation.ts: Defines navigation types and exports navigation items array with screen IDs, labels, and icon names for the app's main navigation menu.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/screens/Alerts.tsx: Alerts screen component that displays AI signals and allows users to create, toggle, and delete price alerts for stocks with customizable conditions (above/below target prices).
frontend/src/screens/DemoTrading.tsx: Demo trading screen that provides a practice trading interface with virtual money, showing account balance, positions, profit/loss, and allowing users to buy/sell stocks without real financial risk.
frontend/src/screens/HomeDashboard.tsx: Main dashboard screen displaying market overview cards, trending stocks list with price changes, major indices, and a user watchlist with star icons.
frontend/src/screens/Learning.tsx: Learning center screen that organizes educational content by category (Basics, Orders, Risk), displays lessons with difficulty badges and duration, and shows video tutorials with thumbnails.
frontend/src/screens/LiveChartPractice.t: Practice mode screen with a simulated price chart, playback controls (start/pause/reset), adjustable simulation speed slider, and educational tips about market behavior observation.
frontend/src/screens/ProfileSettings.tsx: User settings screen with profile display, dark/light theme toggle, risk level selection (conservative/moderate/aggressive), and notification preferences.
frontend/src/screens/Trading.tsx: Trading interface with stock selector dropdown, price chart with timeframe tabs (1D/1W/1M/3M), technical indicator toggles, and order entry form for buying/selling stocks.
frontend/src/screens/Welcome.tsx: Initial welcome screen displaying the TradeBuddy logo, tagline, and a continue button with fade-in animations.
frontend/src/state/alertsStore.ts: Zustand store managing price alerts with persistence, supporting add/toggle/delete operations for alerts with above/below conditions on stock symbols.
frontend/src/state/demoTradingStore.ts: Zustand store managing demo trading state with $100k initial balance, positions, trade history, and buy/sell operations that persist to local storage.
frontend/src/state/settingsStore.ts: Zustand store for user settings including risk level (conservative/moderate/aggressive) and notification preferences, persisted to local storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, extended theme tokens for UI components (sidebar, chart, card), and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking architectural decisions, features, and known issues for a beginner-friendly trading app prototype with light/dark mode and Welcome screen routing issue.
